SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Interfaces

Interface GameControllerInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
GameController
public interface GameControllerInterface extends Serializable
This interface is used to define the methods of the game controller used by the user to interact with and modify the game state

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    choosePawn(String nickname, PawnColors color)
    This method is used to choose the pawn color by the player it sets the pawn color chosen by the player in the model it notifies the players views of the successful choice If the player has already chosen a pawn color or the color is not valid, the player will be considered malevolent and notified If the pawn chosen is already taken, the player will be notified and repeated the choice If the player choosing is the last one to choose the game will progress to the next state i.e.
    void
    chooseSecretObjective(String nickname, LightCard objectiveCard)
    This method is used to choose the secret objective card by the player it sets the secret objective card chosen by the player in the model it notifies the players views of the successful choice If the player has already chosen a secret objective card or the card is not valid, the player will be considered malevolent and notified If the player choosing is the last one to choose the game will progress to the next state i.e.
    void
    draw(String nickname, DrawableCard deckID, int cardID)
    This method is used to draw a card from the deck it adds the card to the player's hand and notifies all the players views of the drawn to the player that drew the card it notifies the drawn card to the other players it notifies just the back of the card If it is not the player's turn or the deckID / cardID is not valid, the player will be considered malevolent and notified If the decks are empty, the phase will be skipped After the drawing, the game turns will progress If the winning condition are met, the game will end
    void
    place(String nickname, LightPlacement placement)
    This method is used to place a card in the player codex it sets the card in the player codex, and notifies all the players views of the placement If it is not the player's turn or the card is not valid, the player will be considered malevolent and notified After the placement, the player will progress to the drawing phase If the decks are empty, the turns will progress If the winning condition are met, the game will end

  • Method Details

    • chooseSecretObjective

      void chooseSecretObjective(String nickname, LightCard objectiveCard)
      This method is used to choose the secret objective card by the player it sets the secret objective card chosen by the player in the model it notifies the players views of the successful choice If the player has already chosen a secret objective card or the card is not valid, the player will be considered malevolent and notified If the player choosing is the last one to choose the game will progress to the next state i.e. the actual game will start and all the active players will be notified
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player choosing the secret objective card
      objectiveCard - the secret objective card chosen by the player

    • choosePawn

      void choosePawn(String nickname, PawnColors color)
      This method is used to choose the pawn color by the player it sets the pawn color chosen by the player in the model it notifies the players views of the successful choice If the player has already chosen a pawn color or the color is not valid, the player will be considered malevolent and notified If the pawn chosen is already taken, the player will be notified and repeated the choice If the player choosing is the last one to choose the game will progress to the next state i.e. the choice of the secret objective and all the active players will be notified
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player choosing the pawn color
      color - the pawn color chosen by the player

    • place

      void place(String nickname, LightPlacement placement)
      This method is used to place a card in the player codex it sets the card in the player codex, and notifies all the players views of the placement If it is not the player's turn or the card is not valid, the player will be considered malevolent and notified After the placement, the player will progress to the drawing phase If the decks are empty, the turns will progress If the winning condition are met, the game will end
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player placing the card
      placement - the placement of the card in the player codex, specifying the card placed, its position and the face shawn

    • draw

      void draw(String nickname, DrawableCard deckID, int cardID)
      This method is used to draw a card from the deck it adds the card to the player's hand and notifies all the players views of the drawn to the player that drew the card it notifies the drawn card to the other players it notifies just the back of the card If it is not the player's turn or the deckID / cardID is not valid, the player will be considered malevolent and notified If the decks are empty, the phase will be skipped After the drawing, the game turns will progress If the winning condition are met, the game will end
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player drawing the card
      deckID - the deck from which the card is drawn (either Resource or Gold)
      cardID - the position of the card to draw (0,1 for the buffer, 2 for the deck)
